reviews.review_msg: This was the easiest class I have ever taken in my life! Tim was a fantastic guy who has a pure passion for education; the lectures can be dry, but I'd rather sit in on a class in which I understood what was going on, then be dumbfounded the entire time. A huge online component, but the largest essay we had to write was only 700 words. AWESOME !

I really enjoyed my Education 100 class with Michele, she is super approachable and leaves the learning up to you in a meaningful way. She uses creative ways for you to show understanding of a topic which makes it way more interesting and fun.  I enjoyed all my assignments this semester.

Granted the class is VERY different from what I expected it to be, but it is entertaining nonetheless.  It's basically counselling.  I find Meguido to be very nice and a very happy man.  I enjoy this class thoroughly, and it is definetly an easy "A&q
very helpful course. Excellent TA and good insturctor!

EDU 100 with Meg Zuccaro is a great class for students even if they aren't interested in education. You will learn a great deal about yourself, and what is important to you in life. It may sound all fluffy, but trust me, once you take it, you'll love it.
